inclusion.criterion: Cardiac Arrest patients who received eith CPR and/or defibrillation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ventricular Fibrillation or Pulseless Ventricular Tachycardia
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients pronounced dead without attempting CPR according to standard operating procedure and ILCOR guidelines
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac arrest obviously caused by major trauma
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope was admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias.
